Html:
I am experimenting with  the WPF ribbon using Visual studio 2008 C#.  I cannot view the contents of the ribbon tab other than the first one listed in the Xaml page.  By clicking on any Ribbon tab, the contents should come to the front.

Am I missing something?

 

<input id="gwProxy" type="hidden" /><input id="jsProxy" onclick="jsCall();" type="hidden" />

I might add it is during the editing or writing the Xaml coding that I cannot view the contents of other Ribbon tabs. Once compiled it runs Ok and can view the other tabs

Hytrano
